import React from 'react' class Filter extends React.Component { openFilterMenu() { document.querySelector('.filterList').classList.toggle('open') } render() { const vegetarian = 'Vegetarian' const vegan = 'Vegan' const gf = 'Gluten Free' const { updateFilter } = this.props return(

{ vegetarian }

{ vegan }

{ gf }

{/* Some un-used filters for later */} {/*

Dairy Free

Nut Free

*/}
) } } export default Filter
